items.raw_desc: PC játék Forgotten but Unbroken - PC Digital: Authentic characters and real historical eventsForgotten but Unbroken PC is a fresh take on turn-based strategy set in World War II, and brings elements that have not been used in this genre before. The game draws inspiration from real historical events and allows players to not only fight in intense defensive missions, but also to meet authentic characters whose stories have often been forgotten. Realism without magical healingUnique "micro" mechanisms add to the realism of Forgotten but Unbroken PC. For example, special skills gained through specific equipment or the absence of magical healing. Build relationships with alliesElite enemy units, including the dreaded SS, have been designed to inspire terror, directly affecting players' ability to aim accurately and reducing their combat effectiveness. A key part of Forgotten but Unbroken PC is also building relationships with allies who can provide players with temporary support in the form of elite soldiers.
